parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: NoShardBackup
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to show backup set information for shards in the instance.

*   **true**: does not show backup set information for shards in the instance.
*   **false** (default): shows backup set information for shards in the instance.

Valid values:

*   True
*   False

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values:

*   30
*   50
*   100
*   200
*   300
*   5
*   10
*   15
*   20

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~473763~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
